original_text: I went to our Jewish meeting places to take hold of believers. I told my men to punish them. I tried to make the believers say bad things against God. I was very angry with them. So I even travelled to cities in other countries to punish them.
korean_text: 또 모든 회당에서 여러 번 형벌하여 강제로 모독하는 말을 하게 하고 그들에 대하여 심히 격분하여 외국 성에까지 가서 박해하였고

sentences.original_text: I went to our Jewish meeting places
I told my men to punish them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 사람들에게 그들을 벌하라고 명령했습니다

sentences.original_text: I tried to make the believers say bad things against God
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 믿는 사람들이 하나님을 비방하는 말을 하도록 만들려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: I was very angry with them
So I even travelled to cities in other countries
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 다른 나라의 도시들까지도 여행했습니다
